title: Jeanine Pirro reversed false election claims in lawsuit testimony
shortDescription: In court depositions, the now-US attorney for Washington, DC said Smartmatic didn't rig the election for Biden, despite her claims as Fox News host.

title: Trump wants to bring back Department of War
shortDescription: "We want to be offensive, too." President Trump suggests renaming Department of Defense to its previous title of the Department of War.

title: Trump fires Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook
shortDescription: "I have determined that there is sufficient cause to remove you from your position," Trump said in a letter to Cook posted on Truth Social.

title: Pritzker rejects Trump’s troop threat
shortDescription: Gov. JB Pritzker pushes back on Trump’s threat to deploy military to Chicago, calling it dangerous and unnecessary.

title: Jailed trucker puts spotlight on Trump immigration policy
shortDescription: An Indian trucker, in the US illegally, is accused of causing a fatal accident in Florida. Now the Trump administration is cracking down on all immigrant truckers.

title: Trump wants a Department of War: 'We want to be offensive, too'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump brushed aside any concerns about Congress not going along with his plans. “We’re just going to do it,” he said.

title: See Trump's use of American flag symbolism in photos
shortDescription: Trump has often employed the symbolism of the American flag throughout his political career. On Aug. 25, he moved to penalize those who burn it.

title: FEMA staff tell Congress Trump officials risk Katrina-level disaster
shortDescription: The letter signed by 35 named employees said Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem and acting FEMA director David Richardson lack qualifications.

title: House committee wants Epstein 'birthday book' with alleged Trump message
shortDescription: President Donald Trump sued the Wall Street Journal after it reported on a bawdy birthday greeting the paper said he had made for Jeffery Epstein.

title: Trump pushes DC National Guard into bigger public safety role
shortDescription: Trump rejected allegations that his use of the National Guard in Los Angeles and Washington, DC, was an abuse of power. "I'm not a dictator," he said.

title: Trump calls Chris Christie ‘a slob’ as Hudson River feud persists
shortDescription: Trump called former New Jersey Gov. Chris Christie 'a slob' but stopped short of saying he should be criminally investigated.

title: Trump presses South Korea on church raids
shortDescription: President Donald Trump questioned South Korea’s president Lee Jae Myung over a probe into ousted leader Yoon Suk Yeol's declaration of martial law.

title: Trump's hand makeup goes viral. Here's what the White House has said.
shortDescription: Photos of the president's hand, showing bruising and apparent makeup, have made the rounds on social media. Here's what the White House has said.

title: Trump signs order against flag burning
shortDescription: President Donald Trump signed an executive order enforcing jail time for flag burning despite First Amendment concerns.

title: Trump: Some Americans may 'like a dictator'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said some Americans may "like a dictator” while defending his stance on violence in Chicago.

title: 'Purge or revolution?' Trump presses South Korea on martial law probe
shortDescription: Trump said he was concerned by "very vicious raids on churches by the new government in South Korea."

title: Is flag burning protected speech? What to know about Trump's order
shortDescription: The Supreme Court upheld the right of protesters to burn the American flag in a landmark 1989 case. President Trump is testing that in a new order.

title: Trump moves to end cashless bail
shortDescription: President Trump signs two executive orders surrounding cashless bail policies. Here's what cashless bail means.

title: 'I'm not a dictator': Trump defends deploying military in crime crackdown
shortDescription: As Democrats push back on a military crackdown on crime in U.S. cities, Trump defended the move and said it is not about authoritarianism.

title: Trump says he will attend Ryder Cup, the latest of many sports events
shortDescription: Donald Trump announced he will attend the Ryder Cup in New York, a biennial golf tournament. He has also attended the Super Bowl and UFC fights.

title: The end of bail reform? Trump orders cash bond for anyone who's arrested
shortDescription: Trump signed two orders that aim to require criminal suspects to post cash bail to get released from jail before trial.

title: Trump wants a year in prison for flag burners. Is that legal?
shortDescription: Trump seeks to charge people who burn flags that incite violent crime, which he argued wouldn't be protected as political speech.

title: France summons Ivanka Trump's father-in-law in antisemitism spat
shortDescription: U.S. Ambassador to France Charles Kushner wrote an open letter asking French President Emmanuel Macron to tone down his criticism of Israel.

title: Is Trump ending Section 8? Not yet, but he suggested these changes
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's FY2026 budget included some drastic changes to HUD's rental assistance program known as Section 8. Is it ending under the bill?
